TEXT.English: Restore order first, then investigate and redress some of the slaves' grievances.

TEXT.English: We are too busy to be bothered. Leave the matter to the local authorities. (Revolt may continue)

TEXT.Russian: Äóõîâíûå ëèäåðû ïðèçûâàþò íàñ èñêàòü áëàãîñëîâåíèÿ ó ìîðÿ![PARAGRAPH:1]Îíè ãîâîðÿò, ÷òî ìû äîëæíû íàéòè âûõîä ê ìîðþ è ðàñïðîñòðàíèòü íàøå âëèÿíèå íà íîâûå çåìëè.
TEXT.English: Our spiritual leaders are urging us to seek the blessings of the sea![PARAGRAPH:1]The wise masters have divined the way regarding our relationship with the sea. They urge us to embrace the sea, to broaden our influence over it and spread our traditions to new lands.

TEXT.Russian: Áëàãîñëîâåííîå ìîðå[PARAGRAPH:1]Äóõîâíûå ëèäåðû ïðîñÿò âàñ îñíîâàòü íåñêîëüêî ãîðîäîâ íà íîâîé çåìëå. Âûïîëíèâ èõ ïîðó÷åíèå, âû ñìîæåòå âûáðàòü ñåáå íàãðàäó.
TEXT.English: The Blessed Sea[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your religious leaders to found cities on new landmasses. If you can build enough cities on new landmasses you will please the masters, who will offer you a choice of rewards.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Äëÿ âûïîëíåíèÿ ýòîãî çàäàíèÿ âû äîëæíû îñíîâàòü èëè çàõâàòèòü ãîðîäà íà ñëåäóþùåì êîëè÷åñòâå íîâûõ çåìåëü: %d1. Ýòî ìîãóò áûòü êàê îñòðîâà, òàê è öåëûå êîíòèíåíòû. Ñ÷èòàþòñÿ âñå ÷àñòè ñóøè, íà êîòîðûõ ñòîèò õîòÿ áû îäèí âàø ãîðîä. Âòîðîé è ïîñëåäóþùèå ãîðîäà íà òîì æå îñòðîâå èëè êîíòèíåíòå íå ñ÷èòàþòñÿ. TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must establish or capture cities on %d1 total landmasses of any size, from one-plot islands to massive continents. All landmasses where you have at least one city are counted. Note that additional cities on the same island or continent do not help in this quest. The goal is to establish your presence on a number of different landmasses and thereby prove your mastery over the waters.[PARAGRAPH:1] You will fail this quest if you change state religions, cease to have a state religion or reach [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialism[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: Receive a Temple improvement in all cities with five population or more, where your State Religion is present.

TEXT.Russian: Ïîëó÷èòü Âåëèêîãî ïðîðîêà.
TEXT.English: Receive a Great Prophet.

TEXT.English: A %s4_civ_adjective passenger aircraft has crashed within %s1_civ_adjective territory. Neither side has provided any details of the incident.

TEXT.English: One of your passenger airliners has crashed in %s1_civ_adjective territory. They have allowed unrestricted access to your recovery teams, building trust between your two nations.

TEXT.Russian: Íàø ïàññàæèðñêèé ñàìîëåò ïîòåðïåë êðóøåíèå íà òåððèòîðèè, êîòîðîé âëàäåþò %s1_civ_adjective. Îíè îáåñïå÷èëè íàøèì ñïàñàòåëÿì äîñòóï ê ìåñòó êðóøåíèÿ, õîòÿ è íå ñðàçó.
TEXT.English: One of your passenger airliners has crashed in %s1_civ_adjective territory. They seemed to be unsure how to react at first, but finally allowed your recovery teams access to the crash site.

TEXT.Russian: Íàø ïàññàæèðñêèé ñàìîëåò ïîòåðïåë êðóøåíèå íà òåððèòîðèè, êîòîðîé âëàäåþò %s1_civ_adjective. Îíè çàïðåòèëè äîñòóï ê îáëîìêàì, îáúÿâèâ èõ ñâîåé ñîáñòâåííîñòüþ. Ýòî îáîñòðèëî îòíîøåíèÿ ìåæäó íàøèìè äåðæàâàìè.
TEXT.English: One of your passenger airliners has crashed in %s1_civ_adjective territory. They are denying all access and have claimed the wreckage as their own. This outrage has angered your people and driven a diplomatic wedge between your two nations.

TEXT.English: Bandits are wreaking havoc in %s1_civ_adjective farmlands.

TEXT.English: Farmers outside %s2_city are complaining of bandits robbing them regularly.

TEXT.Russian: Ðàçáîéíèêè ãðàáÿò ôåðìû â ðàéîíå ãîðîäà %s2_city.
TEXT.English: We may need to take action against thieves in %s2_city who are preying upon our farmers.

TEXT.English: We need that food. Do whatever it takes to deal with those bandits.

TEXT.English: The local authorities of %s2_city are still struggling to control the bandit activity plaguing our farmers.

TEXT.English: Criminals are still preying on our farmers. A more stringent response may be necessary in %s2_city.

TEXT.Russian: Äóõîâíûå ëèäåðû ãîâîðÿò, ÷òî íà íàø íàðîä ñíèçîéäåò áîæåñòâåííîå áëàãîñëîâåíèå, åñëè ìû îòûùåì Ñâÿùåííóþ ãîðó![PARAGRAPH:1]Áîãîñëîâû èçó÷èëè äðåâíèå ïèñüìåíà, â êîòîðûõ óïîìèíàëàñü Ñâÿùåííàÿ ãîðà. TEXT.English: Our religious leaders believe our people can earn the blessings of the deity if we can reclaim the Holy Mountain![PARAGRAPH:1]They have studied the scriptures with an eye toward locating the holy mountain. They have so far not found it anywhere within our lands and believe that it must lie elsewhere. More study will be needed if we are to identify the sacred location.

TEXT.English: The Holy Mountain[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your religious leaders to locate, settle near and seize control over the Holy Mountain.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Öåëü âàøèõ ïîèñêîâ - Ñâÿùåííàÿ ãîðà, íà êîòîðóþ âû äîëæíû ðàñïðîñòðàíèòü ñâîå êóëüòóðíîå âëèÿíèå. Çäàíèå %s2_building ïîìîãàåò îáúåäèíèòü óñèëèÿ ñëóæèòåëåé êóëüòà, â ýòîì îòíîøåíèè îíî ýêâèâàëåíòíî ÷åòûðåì õðàìàì.[PARAGRAPH:1]Åñëè âû ñìåíèòå ãîñóäàðñòâåííóþ ðåëèãèþ, îòêàæåòåñü îò òàêîâîé èëè èçó÷èòå [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Èíäóñòðèàëèçàöèþ[COLOR_REVERT], çàäàíèå áóäåò ïðîâàëåíî. Êðîìå òîãî, â ïîèñêàõ Ñâÿùåííîé ãîðû âàñ ìîæåò îïåðåäèòü äðóãàÿ äåðæàâà.
TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must extend your cultural influence and control over the Peak plot that is the Holy Mountain. You may achieve this by divine providence by settling near any Peaks you find. Eventually you may find the right one.[PARAGRAPH:1]Or you may seek further guidance from studying the holy scriptures. If you build %d3 religious buildings (Temples and Monasteries), your religious leaders will solve the puzzle and identify the correct location of the Holy Mountain, which you must then still go and settle near to complete the quest. A %s2_building allows for more coordinated worship and is worth as much as four Temples for the purposes of this quest.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if you change state religions, cease to have a state religion, or reach [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialism[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions. You will also fail this quest if any other civilization takes control of the Holy Mountain before you do.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have located the Holy Mountain and extended your cultural influence over the sacred site!

TEXT.Russian: Âû ïîñòðîèëè äîñòàòî÷íî õðàìîâ è ìîíàñòûðåé, âàøè áîãîñëîâû íàøëè òî÷íîå ìåñòîïîëîæåíèå Ñâÿùåííîé ãîðû. Ïîñòðîéòå ïîñåëåíèå ðÿäîì ñ íåé, ÷òîáû âûïîëíèòü çàäàíèå!
TEXT.English: You have built enough religious buildings for your religious leaders to solve the puzzle and identify the correct location of the Holy Mountain. Settle near that location to complete the quest!

TEXT.Russian: Áëàãîäàðÿ ñâîèì èñêóñíûì çíàõàðÿì %s1_civ_adjective íàó÷èëèñü èñïîëüçîâàòü ìåñòíûå ðàñòåíèÿ äëÿ ïðîèçâîäñòâà íîâîãî ëåêàðñòâà.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective horticulturists have harnessed rare local resources to produce remedies.

TEXT.English: Certain rare insects found near %s2_city, when harvested and ground into a paste by a reclusive tribe, can be ingested to reduce fever.

TEXT.English: We should establish internal trade with the locals for these rare commodities.

TEXT.English: Fund efforts to increase production without endangering the natural resources that produce them.

TEXT.Russian: Áëàãîðàçóìíûå %s1_civ_adjective âëîæèëè ñðåäñòâà â ðàçâèòèå íàðîäíûõ ïðîìûñëîâ. Â ãîðîäå %s2_city ðàçâèâàþòñÿ çäðàâîîõðàíåíèå è èññëåäîâàíèÿ.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective investments in horticulture have paid off! A new minor industry is thriving in %s2_city, boosting health and research.

TEXT.Russian: Ïîãîâàðèâàþò, ÷òî %s1_civ_adjective ñêðûâàþò áåãëåöà, êîòîðîãî èùóò %s4_civ_adjective.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective authorities are rumored to have captured a fugitive fleeing from %s4_civ_adjective justice. No confirmation is available.

TEXT.English: A fugitive from justice, wanted for crimes in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire, has been discovered hiding out in our territory.

TEXT.Russian: Íàåìíûé óáèéöà, êîòîðîãî ðàçûñêèâàþò %s1_civ_adjective, ïîéìàí íà íàøèõ çåìëÿõ.

TEXT.English: Our gesture of goodwill toward the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has angered %s6_player.

TEXT.English: Word of our interrogation of the fugitive has leaked to %s3_civ_adjective authorities, angering them.

TEXT.Russian: Íåñ÷àñòíûå %s1_civ_adjective â ïàíèêå! Ìîð ïîðàçèë èõ ïëîäîðîäíûå çåìëè.
TEXT.English: Pestilence has struck %s1_civ_adjective agricultural lands.

TEXT.English: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Pasture near %s2_city, destroying all the livestock there.
